description:
How would you like to be…a better-looking guy?

I mean literally a physically more attractive man.

With better-looking skin, better-looking eyes, a better-looking smile…

More balanced-looking facial features…

Most people would say that’s impossible. Unless you count surgery.

Well…what if I told you, you can LEARN how to become a better-looking guy? With better-looking skin, better-looking eyes, a better-looking smile, better-looking hair… A better-looking body…

And what if I told you that NONE of it requires surgery or anything drastic, dangerous, or even expensive?

In fact, what I’m talking about here is simple…it’s straightforward…and it’s easy to do.

Is that something you’d be interested in?

Keep in mind, THOUSANDS of studies and other research has been done on the topic of attractiveness, and these studies have found that better-looking guys:

  • Get paid more money ($230,000 more over their life, on average)…
  • Get hired more often for the same job…
  • Are treated better by teachers in school, AND get better grades…
  • Have more dates, and more sex, with better-looking partners…
  • Are more popular…
  • Have higher self-esteem…
  • Make a better first impression…

One study even found that “Slim, Attractive Men Are Less Likely to Have Bacteria in Their Noses.”

It seems that the benefits of being good-looking are too many to count.

Now you might be thinking: “Ok, I get it. Being attractive makes a big difference in your life. But how much can I realistically change the way I look?”

Turns out…more than you think.

The truth is, you can DRAMATICALLY transform the way you look, by improving just ONE AREA of your appearance:

Your hair…

Your skin…

The way your clothes fit...

Even the way you smile.

And if changing just ONE of these things can have a dramatic improvement on the way you look…

What happens when you improve ALL of them?

Well, you’re about to find out—with “How to Be a Better-Looking Guy.”

In this comprehensive program that’s packed with 9 hours of solid content and not a minute of filler, you are going to lean EVERYTHING you need to know about how to become a physically better-looking guy...and it’s all presented in a way that makes it simple to understand and easy to implement.

Many of the tricks you’ll learn in this program are trade secrets of male models, actors, and other celebrities who have to look good…for a living.

For example, you’re going to learn:

How to use clothes to create an interesting contradiction in your appearance that will give you an air of mystery…

A simple trick for getting the best haircut of your life…

How you can take advantage of the structure of your skin to achieve a more balanced and glowing complexion…

What COLOR of clothes is going to match your skin type the best…

A little-known but super-effective tip for the shower that can improve the way you look for the rest of the entire day…

One easy tip to help channel your inner Don Draper…

Which products to buy at the store, and which ones are a ripoff…knowing this can save you hundreds or even thousands of dollars over the course of a year…

What to do if you’re losing your hair so that you actually look BETTER than you used to…

How to get your clothes to fit your body PERFECTLY…

What hormesis is, and how you can use this scientific process to encourage healthy new skin growth…

Why your perception of the ideal male physique is wrong…

The best way to minimize your belly—just by how you wear your pants…

The hairstyle that is guaranteed to look best on your face…

Tips on how to shop for clothes in a way that saves you money while building a stylish and versatile wardrobe…

Why you should never wear a black suit if you look like this…

And much, much, much more.

Now look:

Is there more to life than being really, really, ridiculously good-looking?

Of course there is.

But the surprising truth is that the effects of your appearance go WAY deeper than your skin. They penetrate down into your wallet, into your head, and into your heart.

The way you LOOK affects the way people perceive you, it affects the way people react to you, and it affects the way people treat you. But even more importantly, the way you look affects the way you FEEL about YOURSELF…on a deep level.

Now if you ask me, that makes it one of the most worthwhile things that you work on to improve the quality of your life.

And the good news is, you don’t have to live another minute looking less than your best. Just sign up now for “How to be a Better-Looking Guy” and before you know it you’re going to look like a million bucks and you’re going to feel even richer than that.

Take a minute to watch some of the free preview videos, and when you’re ready, just click “Take This Course” to get INSTANT access to this valuable information that you cannot find anywhere else.

I’ll see you inside.
title: How to Become a Better-Looking Guy
